metadata.name: Destoria: Founder's Pass #1
metadata.description: Destoria is launching our first NFT, the 'FOUNDERâ€™S PASS'! The pass will provide the holders early access, a selection of usable assets, and an endless array of experiences throughout the Destorian Metaverse. Destoria provides the platform for many digital worlds to pave the future of this space together. Destoria is evolving the P2E platform into  Play & Earn; with games that are immersive to play and allow the gamer to earn while losing themselves as they become engrossed in the experience of play itself.
